bibl.title: Texts in Context: A Methodological Case Study in the Topography of Talei.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.note: Examines ways that the papyrological data, mainly sales contracts, can be combined with the results of the archaeological survey.
bibl.seg: MALOUTA Myrto, Texts in Context: A Methodological Case Study in the Topography of Talei.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 485-491, 3 figg.
